ui.title: Social & Mental Health Services
ui.subtitle: Immediate access sa non-law-enforcement professional support. Ini nga resources para gid sa imo safety kag care.
ui.takedown_promo: Kinahanglan mo bala sang bulig sa formal takedown request?

intouch.name: InTouch Community Services
intouch.description: Quality mental health services dala ang counseling, support groups, kag professional training.

dswd.name: Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD)
dswd.description: Crisis centers kag 24/7 hotlines para sa victims sang violence kag sa mga ara sa krisis.

lunas.name: Lunas Collective
lunas.description: Isa ka volunteer-powered care space para sa mga babayi kag members/allies sang LGBTQIA+ community nga naka-experience sang gender-based violence ukon may sexual kag reproductive health concerns.
lunas.note: Specifically for women and LGBTQIA+ community.

bantay_bata.name: Bantay Bata Helpline 163
bantay_bata.description: Nagasabat sa reports sang child abuse, exploitation, kag neglect, kag naga-connect sa callers sa appropriate agencies.
bantay_bata.note: Specialized for child abuse and exploitation.

ncmh.name: National Center for Mental Health (NCMH) Crisis Line
ncmh.description: 24/7 crisis hotline nga nagahatag sang mental health support kag intervention services.

tawag_paglaum.name: Tawag Paglaum - Centro Bisaya
tawag_paglaum.description: Isa ka 24-hour call-based mental health helpline nga nagahatag serbisyo sa English kag Filipino.

rapha.name: Rapha Helpline
rapha.description: Isa ka safe world para sa mga bata nga hilway sa sexual abuse kag exploitation. Free online mental health support services.
